review_text: Clean, convenient, safe neighborhood, lovely accommodations. Would absolutely recommend!!

Very accommodating host and the place was clean and very enjoyable!
We will be back.
Great stay for those traveling with pets!
Good location, clean, nice shower

Mildred’s Airbnb was in a great location and the neighborhood was stunning! I took a couple of long walks to get exercise and was amazed by the beautiful homes! The Airbnb was quiet and private, easy to access and made my trip very enjoyable!

Perfect place for our visit. Clean, comfortable and quiet. Great host.
Recommend it for your stay in Hammond.

Mildred has a quaint and comfortable property situated in her backyard. Had a great sleep in a comfortable bed with clean an adequate amenities.. I will certainly stay here again when traveling for work.

Really comfortable bed, very clean place in a quiet safe neighborhood. Everything we could have needed was already there, and she even checked to see if we needed anything else. She was always quick with a response and super nice when I sent a message.
Such a nice little spot, much better than a hotel! Got to enjoy my morning coffee with the birds and flowers (and one friendly little lizard!)
The house was very nice and perfectly matched the photos. Beautiful garden. We spent 2 pleasant and relaxing days nearby.

She was very friendly and gave clear instructions on how to get in. She also let us get a later checkout time since we got in late the night of our stay and needed extra rest! The guesthouse was super cozy and clean, I would definitely recommend staying here!
Nice
Just what we needed!
Cute, cozy, comfortable. Perfect after a long day on the road and visiting New Orleans. Must say the bed was super soft which we really appreciated. Exactly the stay we had hoped for!

Easy to find.
Exactly as described.
Great value.

Great little studio place with all the necessities such as kitchen, full bathroom, king size bed and the added bonus we could bring our dog with us. The neighborhood was nice and close to everything. Mildred was very nice and accommodating and quick to respond to any questions.
Highly recommend!
Awesome host. Very accommodating. Beautiful guest house. Comfortable bed and peaceful backyard. We would definitely book again
Good cute quaint guest house!

Exceptionally clean place! Quiet and peaceful neighborhood. As noted it has a ‘kitchenette’ as there is no stove. The full sized fridge/ freezer was great for keeping my stuff cool/ frozen while I was there. I was just there overnight but would 100% stay here again.
Excelent place to stay .super clean ,close to the Restaurant and super quiter. Me and my husband very sure will back.The place is very comfortable and nice.
Great place to stay. Nice neighborhood. Close to restaurants.

Loved this little house. Perfect for what me and dog needed. Mildred was very responsive and helpful during my stay. This is a perfect little guest house with all the necessities. Loved this place !!! Wish I would have made a longer reservation to be honest.
We had a fantastic stay at Mildred’s place. Everything was as described. Very cozy and welcoming. We will be booking again on our next trip to Hammond!!

Great spot in Hammond. Super clean and super quiet. Mildred has everything you need for a great stay. Easy check in and you can park right in the driveway. You will need a car to drive into town. Would definitely return.

My stay with Mildred was absolutely amazing. The room was clean and the bed was super comfortable and everything was as described in the listing. The dogs and I had a great time and the neighborhood was perfect for taking a little walk in the early morning or early evening. We will definitely be back.
Loved the space. Super comfy bed, nice big bathroom. Nice neighborhood. Would definitely stay here again.
Very nice peaceful place and it was just perfect for a day or nights rest. I loved it.

Checkin was simple and Mildred always responded within minutes. She was proactive and made our comfort her priority. We had to split our time between New Orleans and Baton Rouge and this was the ideal location and accommodations. I would stay here again should my needs in the future require this central location.
Amazing host, and super friendly. I am a very quiet person so not feeling super pressured into talk felt amazing, will definitely try staying with her again if available.

Very cute cottage. Just here for a quick stay to visit family. Place was easy to find, located in a nice safe neighborhood. House was exactly as described. And the most comfortable bed!
I’ll definitely keep in mind for my next visit.
Cute, comfortable guest house thoughtfully done, every detail you could need for your stay. Quiet neighborhood and friendly welcoming host!
Great place and easy to find

Staying with Mildred was amazing. She and her husband were very kind.
The place was super clean and just perfect. It’s a very private and safe location.
If she will have me again I will definitely be back.
I really enjoyed my stay here. Mildred was very communicative and pleasant. And best of all very welcoming to my pets.
The best! Beautiful, clean place with all amenities. Accessible to shopping and restaurants. Mildred was responsive, friendly and helpful. She showed concern for me as a guest. Wonderful experience.
FABULOUS room! Most comfortable beds! Very safe feeling, great neighborhood!

Mildred was very accommodating! We arrived late in the evening and woke up late. Mildred allowed us extra time for checkout and was extremely quick to respnod on every aspect of our stay! We'll be looking for her place when we come back through the area! SUPER HOST!
Loved it
super cute stayed for Mardi Gras best price hands down!
Beautiful historic home! Great location and walkable.

Tasha was an excellent host. Very responsive and flexible. We needed to check in 2 hours early because of an unexpected change. She replied right away that it was fine. Beautiful old home in quiet neighborhood.

We wanted to stay in Hammond, so we could visit our friends who live there, just a few miles away.
We really enjoyed our four night stay at this adorable country charmer, and it was a huge plus to be walking distance to town, where we went to bars and restaurants and visited a few shops with our friends. We also enjoyed sitting on the beautiful porch, Relaxing with our golden retriever and taking her for long walks in the beautiful neighborhood. It was also nice to have a fenced in backyard to let our dog do her business first thing in the morning and before bed at night.
The home had everything we needed to feel very comfortable, and it’s located in a very safe area!
Tasha was very good at communicating with us from the time we booked until our departure. We would definitely stay there again… Maybe even next spring! 😊
Such and charming property and neighborhood! Great find!

Second time staying at Tasha’s place! Perfectly located for us as it is about a half mile to downtown and also to the baseball field at SLU! Very reasonably priced and has everything we needed! Will stay again!
Tasha’s place was beautiful. This place has so much character. We were in town for an event at Southeastern and the home is only about 5 minutes from campus.
Charming home with all of the necessities and plenty of space. Great location if you want to be in walking distance of family friendly parks and restaurants. Highly recommend this Airbnb.
Second time staying, and will definitely stay again. Great host and great location.

Vintage charm! Enjoyed our stay!
The house and neighborhood was great and walkable to downtown.
Great house in a great part of town. Lots of options for entertainment within walking distance.
Excellent stay. We have stayed here many times and the place and host are great. Thanks

A wonderful place to stay
My family from the UK loved every minute of this beautiful Southern Historic home.
Thanks so much Tasha
Wonderful weekend, very peaceful and accommodating.
Really enjoyed staying at this house!

The house is very much worth the rent. If you are having a small family get together it is much better than 3 hotel rooms. It has plenty of beds and bathrooms and the Dining and Living areas are great for sitting around talking. The front porch is also great for sitting and talking. There's plenty of Parking.
We were very impressed with the wood floors and the furniture. The quality was way beyond our expectations. There has been a lot of thought and effort to keeping everything neat, clean, high quality and in excellent condition. We pray that all future guests take care to treat the home with respect so others can enjoy it as much as we did.
Tasha was very helpful and accommodating during our stay. We had a glitch in communication caused by the AirBnB App. When Tasha would put a message for us on the App, it would send a text message copy to our cell phone. So we would text back. We didn't know that our texts were not going anywhere. Communication improved after we figured that out.

Tasha’s home was lovely. Clearly old, but not outdated. It was very charming. Plus there is so much within walking distance. It was terribly hot outside but felt great inside. Saw nearby homes mention the train nearby, we could hear them but not loudly and it never woke our toddlers. Speaking of, we used the high chair and pack and play and they were in great condition, the extra padded mattress for the pack and play was so helpful.
Lovely house!

Wonderful place! It’s clean, comfortable, in a great location, and supremely well stocked. I came with my husband, baby, and two kids. Everyone liked this place! It’s one of the most comfortable airbnbs I’ve ever stayed in. I hope to come back next year!
Exactly as described! Clean, comfortable, very well stocked! Tasha was very accommodating with my last minute reservation! Super Host!
This house was perfect for our stay! We will definitely stay here again!
BEAUTIFUL NEIGHBORHOOD AND PEOPLE. QUIET AND WITHIN EASY WALK OF PARK, FOOD AND VERY DOG FRIENDLY.
Great location. Well kept house.

Enjoyed staying at this southern charmer. Being from the area and bringing friends and family there to stay was a great decision. Tasha was super helpful and accommodating. Would definitely stay there again.
The house was great! My family enjoyed it very much. Tasha was a fantastic host. She responded to all of our questions in a timely manner and was very clear with the house rules and expectations
Tasha was great to work with, her home was cozy, had comfortable furniture and beds.

This rental is amazing. Tasha was extremely helpful and accommodating with our requests and needs. We came to watch SLU baseball and could walk to the park with ease and the location to downtown restaurants and businesses is perfect! Can’t recommend this rental any more highly!
The House Sits In A Great Area,Not Far From The Downtown Stores And Restaurants,Quit Area And Safe Feeling
Great home, wonderful location, and a host who was super proactive and accommodating.

This house was quite a gem! The house has a lot of characters and charm. I love the space for my family and having the baby essential was a big plus. I would definitely rent again when I visit my family in Hammond!
3rd time there. Excellent stay as always.
Great location, facility was exceptionally clean and located in "old" Hammond. Host was on top of making our stay comfortable.

A lovely home!! The location was great. Walking distance to so many shops, restaurants, etc. I would definitely stay there again and recommend it wholeheartedly!! Easy check-in process. Beautiful and safe neighborhood.

A perfect location! Close enough for walking downtown for dinner and drinks, but far enough to escape the bar noise. This house oozes charm with gorgeous wood floors, a clawfoot tub, built-in cabinets and a huge front porch you never want to leave. We stayed there with my 10-month-old baby and Tasha had a ton of baby items we could use, including a pack-and-play, a baby mattress and a high chair. It really felt like home away from home.
Great place to stay!! We will definitely be back.
Tasha was a great host! Our stay was very comfortable—we will definitely stay here again the next time we need a place in Hammond!

We have family in Hammond and so we were looking for a place that is close by. This place was perfect for us. Tasha was always available and easy to reach. We will definitely be back. Definitely recommend this place.
We had a great stay! The house was very comfortable and was in a great location!

Very nice and close to downtown. Tasha was great with communicating check in and even offered an early check in if we needed it. The only negative is the train coming through nearby, it is very loud. Even with the train I would recommend staying here, and I would stay again.

This home was in a perfect location for all the activities we had planned. Tasha was a fantastic host with fast communication and the easiest check-in process we've had. This historic home had a wonderful feel, and we loved the size of the front porch. If you are planning a trip to Hammond, definitely consider staying here!

If I could give this home a 10 out of 10 stars I completely would. Tasha took very good care of her home when it came to cleanliness and always made sure we had everything we needed. This beautiful home has the southern charm of a historic home while also keeping up with the modern amenities that every house needs. It was in beautiful downtown Hammond where there are plenty of things to do and restaurants to explore. It really was such an amazing stay, very well worth the money.
This home is in the perfect location for any activities that you want to do in Hammond. It is clean and in great shape and the host is outstanding.

BEAUTIFUL AND CLEAN
SMOOTH CHECK IN AND CHECK OUT
TASHA IS A GREAT HOST WITH VERY FAST RESPONSE TIME.
THE STAY WAS GREAT

Beautiful home in the heart of downtown Hammond. Walking distance to lots of restaurants, bars, coffee shops, and at least 2 parks. The house is exactly as advertised with lots of old charm mixed with some modern updates. The host was amazing and super responsive. Would stay here over and over!

We stayed at Tasha’s beautiful home with our toddler and it was wonderful. We spent a lot of time on the front porch swing and loved all of the running room! There are plenty of baby items incase you forget anything and lots of space. Overall, a perfect stay and would highly recommend to anyone visiting Hammond!
We had a great stay as usual! Tasha is a wonderful host!!
Tasha was amazing and very responsive. This home is absolutely amazing. Lots of great places to eat in the area and conveniently located next to SLU! We will definitely be back!
exactly as advertised. great house in a wonderful location. host was very helpful.

This home and host are wonderful! The home has so much character and charm. My family and I had a great time walking to everything nearby and enjoying time on the incredible front porch. This was my second time there and am looking forward to our next visit!

We absolutely loved it! The house is like your home away from home. The beds were so comfortable, I slept amazing. Fully stocked kitchen so we were able to make meals. We were also within walking distance to all the restaurants and the park…it was just the perfect location and exactly what we needed. Wish we could have stayed longer! Tasha was an awesome host!

The house is very spacious and clean. The rooms have 10 foot ceilings and the front porch is the best! Two blocks from a nice park and downtown Hammond. The neighborhoodnis very interesting for a walk arond the block. This was the third time we've stayed here and it's a perfect place to visit with our family!
if you are in the area and want a place that feels like being at home in a convenient location this is a must stay. will be back again without a doubt
Nice house

An absolutely lovely, charming older home that's been beautifully expanded and updated. According to the owner's write-up the home is roughly 100 years old. If so they've left just enough of the old to give it character, but with all the modern comforts and conveniences.
The kitchen boasts rich distressed deep brown wood floors, beneath equally aged cabinets but with all updated hardware and topped off with well matched marble countertops and backsplash. The 5-burner Kenmore is a chef's dream stove. Leaving the kitchen, pantry, and power room area you step into the dining and living rooms with more rich cherry hardwood.
The kitchen was well appointed with everything we needed to prepare meals for our family of five.
Check-in and out was as easy as it gets. Communication with the hosts was flawless. The neighborhood is quiet. We noticed several people out for evening walks. Had our schedule permitted, we might have done the same.
The home appeared to have sufficient closets, however two of the three closets were locked and not available to guests. The third was also being used for storage leaving very little closest space. Given that we were in town for a wedding with multiple long dresses and suits to hang up the limited closet space presented a minor challenge. There were some oddities such as a bedroom that locked from the outside which provided our kids an opportunity for pranking mom & dad by locking us in our room. 🙄
Overall we greatly enjoyed our stay and would definitely love to stay again should we find ourselves back in Hammond.
Tasha’s historic and beautiful home was worth every penny. Outstanding location and within walking distance to downtown. Very quiet neighborhood.
Within walking distance of restaurants and bars. Spacious and clean.
The house was nice and clean and included everything we needed. It is a short walk or drive to restaurants and shopping too. Tasha was easy to work with and very responsive.
Second time staying here with our family. Great house, great location, and excellent host.
Tasha keeps a clean and well maintained home. The house has high ceilings and beautiful architectural details. She communicated promptly with clarity.

This was our first time staying at an Airbnb and we couldn’t have been more pleased. We only had one issue and that wasn’t the host’s fault at all. The house and neighborhood are beautiful. There is so much to do in the area. The smell of the house reminded me of when I would stay with my great grandparents. Brought back some good memories. We would definitely stay again. Thank you
Beautiful home in downtown Hammond with unbeatable access to the university and downtown attractions. Tasha was great!
Great place to stay, beautiful historic home that’s decorated to make you feel welcome. Also has a backup generator to make sure you’re comfortable no matter what.

Great home away from home during house renovations. Great location to fun around downtown, and a nice relaxing front porch. Definitely will be booking again for future anniversaries, weekend getaways, etc.
Super friendly host and very accommodating!
Such a cute little charming house. Right in the middle of downtown, close to everything. Definitely.. would stay again!

My family and I have had the most wonderful week in this sweet home! It is full of the charm and personality of the area. Spent many mornings enjoying coffee on the front porch in this relaxing setting. The home had everything we could have possibly needed-it truly felt like I was staying at a family home.
Location is fantastic! Walking distance to SO many incredible restaurants and shops.
And finally, Tasha was so nice!
We will definitely be back!
This is the second time we stayed here and it was great! We love the location, the front porch, and the nice roomy feeling in the house!
Perfect house. Very nice and well kept. We travelled with 2 kids and they loved it. Nice neighborhood and walking distance to all the restaurants. Already planning to stay there again.

This was our second time staying here. And it never disappoints. Everything is clean and there are lots of awesome little touches. The location is great and sitting in the front porch is relaxing and enjoyable. I would highly recommend this place!

Went for a college baseball weekend to see our son with our adult daughter, friend, & two pups. Super cute, comfortable & perfect location for walking to the baseball game or dinner downtown. Pet friendly & stocked with essentials, and perfectly equipped to cook & relax - especially on the shaded & breezy front porch swing! Highly recommend.
Amazing location for downtown Hammond restaurants and fun! Pet friendly & kid friendly, we’d stay again!
Great place and very clean and comfy. Close to everything in downtown Hammond. Would highly recommend for this area

We had a peaceful family weekend at Tasha’s lovely home. The space was inviting and perfect for our whole family, including our young children. It was just a short walk to tranquil spacious parks and a variety of local restaurants. This old home had lots of charm with all the comforts of a modern home. Tasha was quick to respond to any needs we had. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay! Thank you again!

This house was perfect for me and my family to get away for the weekend and walk to watch my son play Southeastern Football. Sat on the porch with friends till it was game time. Definitely will stay here again!
The house is adorable and charming. It is located very centrally in Hammond with easy access. Charming is the perfect word to describe this house!
We had a GREAT experience with our stay at this beautiful home in Hammond. The hosts could not be nicer and even accommodated a special request during our stay. We will return to this awesome place!
Such a beautiful property! Tasha is a wonderful host! We enjoyed this charming property!
Wonderful old house in a charming area of Hammond. Close to restaurants and bars. Very clean and well appointed. Loved our stay there.
Great place with a ton of Louisiana character! Close to downtown and convenient to everything. Would certainly stay again.

It truly is a southern charmer. What a beautiful old home! The generous space worked perfectly for our large group. Our favorite part was the large front porch and swing to drink coffee and plan our day. Thank you Tasha!
The home was very clean and gorgeous. The renter even had fresh flowers on the kitchen table and there is a park a block away and a train two blocks away that the kids just loved!
Everything was clean and in order. Tasha made everything easy. Lots of little extra touches. Great front porch for relaxing!
Another amazing stay! Couldn’t ask for a better host or more amazing experience all around!

We loved staying at this house. It has a great location in a quiet neighborhood. The front porch was perfect for rocking and swinging. With 2.5 bathrooms there was no waiting, haha! Tasha was very helpful for any special request or question we had. We will definately hope to stay here again for future trips to Hammond!

Everything was great. This is my 2nd time to stay in this beautiful home! Tasha is great. The house is meticulously well kept... Very close to all the restaurants and bars, and 2 blocks from the park.
Would definitely recommend you stay in this beautiful home if you have the chance.

Where do I begin?
Location, Location, Location? 5-stars!
Cleanliness, Friendliness, & Comfort? 5-stars
We travel a lot and stay in a ton of different places. We had a last minute trip pop up to Hammond and thought it would be nice to stay in an AirBNB instead of a hotel. We needed somewhere to stay for a full month. Tasha responded very quickly with an approval to rent her beautiful home.
When we arrived there were fresh flowers on the table. We explored the house with excitement. This 100 year old home was meticulously kept. We were so surprised at how nice everything was. The front porch swing and rocking chairs were our favorite place to hang out every morning with a cup of coffee and every night with a glass of wine.
Tasha was great. We communicated several times via text. She is very knowledgeable about the surrounding area.
I can’t recommend this place enough. We truly had a wonderful time.
Beautiful home and grounds! Spacious home as well as a beautiful pond for fishing. Thank you for the hospitality! Highly recommended. A+
It was a great spot! Very relaxing and peaceful stay. I would highly recommend this place!

This home is a haven! It is located in a beautiful and serene neighborhood. Communication was seamless! The host was responsive and considerate, ensuring our stay was comfortable from start to finish.

We were in Hammond for a softball tournament. We absolutely loved the house and beautiful yard. It was so comfortable for the family to be together in this lovely home.Wish we had more time to spend together. I would definitely come back and rent again. Hopefully the tournament will be close next year.

The only regret we have about our stay is that we didn't have enough time to enjoy this beautiful home/property! Absolutely perfect hosts/location. Hosts were super accommodating and helpful. We would love to stay here again with our whole family to enjoy it. Bed was super comfortable as well!

Petra and Brian's home was the perfect place for myself, my husband, and my four grown children who reunited after 9 years. They had a blast and we had some fun kayaking stories that we won't soon forget. We came for a funeral and Petra wrote a comforting message on her kitchen sign. We were all very comfortable and would return in a heartbeat.
Had a great stay at their home! Everything was just like I expected and seen in pictures! Will definitely stay there again for next visit!

The place was beautiful. Loved, loved, loved the patio and the beautiful outdoors. The home was so clean and welcoming. The hosts left a generous amount of snacks and coffee which was much appreciated. They had a personalized little welcome sign which was a very nice touch. If we were to stay in Hammond again, we would definitely stay there again.
Great hosts and a great property. Perfect for a weekend with family.

We came to town for a wedding & the house was perfect for the 6 of us older adults. Inside & out were both perfect areas. Would highly recommend this house. Very nice remodel, everything was clean & tidy when we arrived.

Brian & Petra’s place is beautiful, comfortable, & spacious. It was a wonderful place for an overnight trip- we all wished we were staying longer! We definitely recommend staying here & plan to return!
House was so very pretty and clean. We really enjoyed our stay. Will book again

The house was beautiful! Inside and out! Unfortunately, we weren't there very long to be able to enjoy all the amenities. Petra & Brian let us check in early so we would have time to dress for a wedding we were attending which helped tremendously. We are hoping to return so we can enjoy spend time there and enjoy it more!

I couldn’t wait to write the review of our stay.
Petra & Bran really put a lot of time, thought and effort into making their guest feel like they were valued. Every detail in the house was well thought out to provide comfort, luxury and security. The communication was given promptly and respectfully. It was a pleasure to meet them in person during our stay and learn the history of how Harper’s Haven came to be.
The location is perfect! It is near the interstate and town but remote enough that you feel nestled in the woods. The outside area provided plenty of room for an outdoor gathering day or night. The inside was beautifully decorated, with a well stocked coffee/ tea bar and snacks for those who are too weary from travel to prepare a meal. The beds rooms a very comfortable with plenty of space and bathrooms are well stocked with necessities for things that might get overlooked when packing. This was one of my favorite stays. We will definitely be back
House was great. Clean, comfortable & quiet. A perfect stay!
The house very clean and had enough room for everyone . Location was great. Quiet neighborhood. The host was very quick to respond. We had a great time and would go back
Very Clean With A Lot to Offer
Such a peaceful and relaxing property managed by the sweetest couple on the planet! I cannot wait to come again!

They were EXCELLENT hosts! Had a cute chalkboard sign customized to my daughter’s cheer team! Had a basket of snacks & cupcakes. Fully stocked coffee bar. Everything was top notch! Excellent communication. Beautiful home. Can’t recommend enough!

very hospital and clean place.
Highly recommended.
We had a wonderful time at Petra and Brian's place. It is beautiful and they have everything you may need. We will definitely return.

Harper's Haven is amazing. This is the best AirBnB I've ever stayed at. We felt right at home, and the setting is so peaceful and quiet. Petra & Bryan ara amazing hosts and really have gone above and beyond to make each space welcoming and comfortable.

Harpers Haven was the perfect place for us while visiting family for the holidays. The home was so clean and nice and also well stocked with everything you need, just show up!
The little touches like the welcome sign, snacks, and bottled water were really sweet and appreciated. Providing logs for the fire pit and bait for the fishing poles went above and beyond expectations, incredible! The space to play, fish, and lounge was just what we needed for our long travel.
We’ve stayed at a several Airbnb and VRBO locaitons and never had those special touches.
You guys went out of your way to make it exceptional!!

They had exceeded my expectations!! I don't usually expect much from airbnbs, but this one WOW. They had thought of everything, they had every amenity that i could think of. The house was super clean and everything was organized , even the little details. And the view was spectacular, beautiful lake right behind the house, and just an overall beautiful location. I will definitely rent out longer next time!
So cozy and clean. They have literally everything you could need. will definitely be back. I'd put 10 stars if I could.
Amazing home in a great location. Superb hosts as well

My Husband and I had a perfect stay on our trip. Petra & Brian’s house is immaculate all the way around. They even left us a personalized holiday gretting on their mini chalkboard, the small touches didn’t go unnoticed. My favorite area was the string lit up patio with hanging swings. It was a beautiful , peaceful, cozy home to stay in. The hosts are attentive to detail and friendly to communicate with.I would highly recommend !🖤

We were here over Thanksgiving for a family reunion in Hammond. Harper’s Haven was exactly what we needed! It was spacious, clean, well organized, with great accommodations and amenities. Very comfortable beds, a well stocked kitchen, and lovely outdoor space made this perfect for our family. I would highly recommend Harper’s Haven and would definitely stay there in the future.

Loved our stay at this tranquil home. The place was exactly as described. There were lots of extra outdoor activities that were not even listed in the description. We stayed with just adults but kids and teens would love this place. Loved all the extra touches like the welcome snacks! We enjoyed sitting outside around the fire pit! The beds were super cozy and comfortable. Just the perfect retreat.
Loved our stay, felt right at home. Was very clean and peaceful!

My stay was amazing! I went there with a couple friends for a wedding that we were in and although we weren’t there often when we were it was perfect no problems or complaints at all so seem less and easy and they go above and beyond there very nice people!

Beautiful house on a great piece of land The outdoor covered area is amazing, and the inside of the house was modern and very clean. They are great hosts; they left snacks and waters for us, and there were fun games all around the house to play. If we come back to this area, we will definitely stay here again

There are no amount of words to describe Ms. Petra and Mr. Brian. They were super understanding and very helpful from start to finish. I absolutely enjoyed my time with my group of friends and it really felt at home. From the sweet little message on the board telling me happy birthday to them also providing snacks and bottles of waters for everyone. I really enjoyed my stay with them. They are all around nice people. The house and the surrounding area is quiet and peaceful you couldn’t even tell it was a neighborhood how quiet it was and that’s one of the best part. I was super upset we didn’t get to experience the outside area because we were traveling so much but we will definitely be booking with them again. I would say definitely book with them you will not be disappointed!!

Harper's Haven was beautifully decorated. You felt comfortable the moment you walked inside. I will recommend this home to friends and family. The host were quick to respond and always helpful with any question.

I met the owners before our reservation, and they both are really polite, very helpful throughout the entire process, and always responded in less than 24 hrs about all the questions I had. The place is really nice, very relaxing and we had a great time. I would recommend this place to anyone that is trying to find a nice place around this area with lots of space for different activities for the entire family. Thank you Petra and Brian for everything you did to make sure our stay in there was enjoyable!!!!
Harper’s place was wonderful! We wish we would have more time there. My kids absolutely loved it! Beautiful place and lots of space. Great outdoor activities as well!

Brian and Petra have a beautiful place. It was and quiet and peaceful. The amenities were great. Anything you would need away from home they had it available. It was very homey. It was immaculate when we opened up was at our fingertips the door any entertainment that most people would like was at our fingertips. I would definitely recommend staying there and I am looking forward to coming back.
We enjoyed our stay! Very well thought out! Lots of amenities that made it a great family space.
Beautiful place to stay, highly recommended for family vacation
Really beautiful home, nestled into some lovely land! The home had everything you could need and was very clean. Communication with the hosts was awesome and we so enjoyed the stay!
It was perfect for me and my wife. We attended a baseball tourney at SLU. We could walk to the games. If we return in the fall for a football game we will stay here! Thanks!
Excellent stay, superb hosts beautiful comfortable accommodation
Brilliant place,spotless with superb hosts

I feel very lucky to have happened upon this place; I was in town for the Strawberry Festival and it was perfect for my stay. I couldn’t imagine staying anywhere else if I take a trip like this again. The host was super sweet and very informative/helpful. The location was beautiful and I loved that I could literally walk a couple blocks to the downtown area where some of my favorite restaurants were! This place was definitely worth every penny to me and I only wish I could have stayed longer!

Our stay was perfect! Debi and Rex had literally anything you needed, and were very accommodating! The apartment is beautiful, and in the perfect location for any stay in Hammond. Will definitely be our go to stay for any trip to Hammond, America.

Great place! It is walking distance to SLU and downtown. Debi & Rex were very responsive to our questions. They were flexible with our travel plans and left us many snacks. The rental was very clean and comfortable. We have already booked this place again for our next trips to Hammond.

My teenage son & I stayed here for the weekend because he had a soccer tournament 15 minutes away in Hammond. Everything about this rental was superior!
